name: Serious 6
description: Serious 6 from Serious Seeds mixes undefined Canadian genetics with sativa landraces from Africa. It is known for its small leaves and a colorful phenotype that shows pink pistils. Almost a pure sativa, Serious 6 boasts a spicy citrus aroma with a clear-headed cerebral buzz of effects that spark creativity and give a burst of energy.
attributes_title: Creative, Energetic, Focused, Happy, Hungry, Stress, Depression, Eye Pressure, Fatigue, Inflammation, Anxious, Paranoid, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
